YOY.Group — Retail systems + AI operating models for culture-led brands.

We help:
- Consumer brands (fashion, lifestyle, media) that want faster execution with less waste.
- Operators building modern commerce stacks (Shopify + automations + data).
- Teams turning brand, software, and distribution into one system.

Start here (canonical):
- Pillars: /pillars
- Services overview: /services
- Retail service: /services/retail
- Rails service: /services/rails
- Creators service: /services/creators
- Proof (evidence): /proof
- Log (time-bound updates): /log
- Playbooks: /playbooks
- Glossary: /glossary

Principles:
- Publish deltas, not vibes.
- Claims belong in Proof or they don’t ship.
- Prefer simple, testable systems over complex tooling.

- hello@yoy.group
